events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund or an exchange because the size was incorrect.
The customer's complaint was identified as a refund request related to sizing issues with a purchased jacket.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah for further handling of the refund and exchange request.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the refund or exchange for your jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also let us know if the jacket has been worn or if the tags are still intact? This will help us process your refund efficiently.
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is completely unworn, and all tags are still attached as when it arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund right away once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I appreciate your help in making this process smooth.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
